alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:03AM CDT until June 15 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Greene County in west central Iowa... Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Audubon County in west central Iowa... Southeastern Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 103 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Manning to Audubon to 8 miles north of Atlantic, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Audubon, Guthrie Center, Coon Rapids, Lake Panorama, Exira, Scranton, Bayard, Churdan, Templeton, Bagley, Dedham, Brayton, Willey, Ralston, Gray, Audubon County Airport and Springbrook State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
